title: MicroPPPID
summary:
TLDR; You can find the project repository here.
Motivation I recently took up pottery as my new favourite hobby and I needed a better way to control the firing of my pots.
For my first few pots, I just re-purposed my very cheap metal casting forge. I built this out of eight 1" thick fire bricks, some fire cement, an electric stove top “burner” and a cheap PID controller.
The cheap PID controller was horrible.
